name: Masala Dosa
description: Masala Dosa is a beloved South Indian breakfast dish made from a fermented rice and urad dal batter, cooked into a thin, crispy crepe. The dosa is filled with a mildly spiced potato masala made with mashed potatoes, sautéed onions, mustard seeds, curry leaves, and turmeric. It is traditionally served hot with coconut chutney, tangy sambar (a lentil-based vegetable stew), and sometimes tomato chutney. Its savory, crispy, and hearty nature makes it both comforting and satisfying.
health_benefits: Rich in protein, fiber, and iron. The fermented batter aids digestion and provides probiotics. The combination of rice and lentils offers complete protein. Low in fat and helps maintain blood sugar levels.
ingredients: Fermented rice and urad dal batter

name: Idli
description: Soft, fluffy steamed rice cakes made from fermented rice and lentil batter. Idlis are light, healthy, and typically served with sambar and coconut chutney for a wholesome breakfast.
health_benefits: Excellent source of protein and carbohydrates. The fermentation process increases bioavailability of nutrients. Low in calories and fat, making it ideal for weight management. Contains essential amino acids and minerals.

name: Hyderabadi Biryani
description: A regal rice dish from Hyderabad, featuring fragrant basmati rice layered with marinated meat, caramelized onions, and aromatic spices. Slow-cooked to perfection, it's a celebration on a plate.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from meat and complex carbohydrates from rice. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices used have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides sustained energy and helps in muscle building.

name: Haleem
description: A rich, slow-cooked stew made with wheat, lentils, and tender meat, flavored with aromatic spices and ghee. Traditionally enjoyed during Ramadan, it's hearty, creamy, and deeply satisfying.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from meat and complex carbohydrates from wheat and lentils. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices used have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides sustained energy and helps in muscle building.

name: Mirchi Bajji
description: A spicy street snack: large green chilies stuffed, dipped in gram flour batter, and deep-fried until golden. Crispy outside, soft and fiery inside—perfect with a cup of chai.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants from chilies. Contains essential minerals. The gram flour provides fiber. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Double Ka Meetha
description: A rich Hyderabadi dessert made from fried bread slices soaked in saffron- and cardamom-infused milk, topped with ghee and dry fruits. It's a festive treat, especially during weddings.
health_benefits: Rich in carbohydrates from bread. Contains essential minerals. The milk provides calcium. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Qubani Ka Meetha
description: A traditional Hyderabadi dessert made from dried apricots stewed in sugar syrup, garnished with cream and nuts. It's luscious, tangy, and a must-have at Hyderabadi feasts.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants from apricots. Contains essential minerals. The cream provides healthy fats. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Irani Chai
description: A creamy, aromatic tea brewed with milk and cardamom, Irani Chai is a staple in Hyderabad's old-world cafes. Served in small cups, it's perfect for a relaxing break.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants from tea. Contains essential minerals. The cardamom has anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Keema Samosa
description: A savory snack: crisp pastry pockets filled with spiced minced meat, onions, and herbs. Deep-fried until golden, they're a popular treat during Ramadan and festive occasions.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from minced meat. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides energy and helps in muscle maintenance.

name: Malai Kulfi
description: A traditional Indian frozen dessert made from thickened milk, sugar, and nuts. Creamy, dense, and flavored with cardamom and saffron, it's the perfect summer treat.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains healthy fats from nuts. Good source of carbohydrates. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Hyderabadi Dum Ka Murgh
description: A rich, creamy chicken curry with a hint of tamarind. The chicken is cooked until tender and the sauce is thick and flavorful.
health_benefits: High in protein from chicken. Contains essential minerals. The yogurt provides probiotics. Helps in muscle building and gut health.

name: Khatti Dal
description: A tangy and hearty lentil preparation featuring toor dal cooked with tamarind, onions, and aromatic spices. The perfect balance of sour and savory flavors makes it a comforting accompaniment to rice or roti.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and fiber from lentils. Contains essential minerals. The tamarind provides vitamin C. Helps in digestion and maintains gut health.

name: Lukhmi
description: A Hyderabadi specialty: square-shaped pastries filled with spiced minced meat, onions, and herbs. These flaky, savory treats are larger than samosas and make perfect appetizers or tea-time snacks.
health_benefits: Good source of protein from minced meat. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides energy and helps in muscle maintenance.

name: Sheer Khurma
description: A luxurious Eid delicacy made with dates, vermicelli, and milk, enriched with nuts and aromatic cardamom. This creamy dessert is garnished with dried fruits and served warm or chilled during festive celebrations.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains healthy fats from nuts. Good source of carbohydrates. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Pathar Ka Gosht
description: A unique Hyderabadi delicacy where marinated meat is cooked on a heated stone slab, infusing it with a distinctive smoky flavor. The meat is tenderized with papaya and seasoned with special spices for a truly memorable dish.
health_benefits: High in protein from meat. Contains essential minerals. The stone cooking method preserves nutrients. Helps in muscle building and provides energy.

name: Hyderabadi Baingan
description: Tender eggplants cooked in a rich, aromatic gravy with ground spices, peanuts, and sesame seeds. This classic Hyderabadi preparation brings out the best in eggplants with its perfect blend of spices and textures.
health_benefits: Rich in fiber and antioxidants from eggplant. Contains essential minerals. The peanuts provide protein and healthy fats. Helps in heart health and digestion.

name: Khagina
description: A hearty Hyderabadi breakfast dish featuring fluffy scrambled eggs cooked with finely chopped onions, green chilies, and aromatic spices. This protein-rich dish is often served with hot paratha or naan bread.
health_benefits: Excellent source of protein from eggs. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle building and brain function.

name: Malai Paya
description: A rich, creamy curry made with tender goat trotters slow-cooked with milk, aromatic spices, and herbs. This luxurious dish is traditionally enjoyed for breakfast and is known for its intense flavor and nutritional value.
health_benefits: Rich in collagen and protein from goat trotters. Contains essential minerals. The milk provides calcium. Helps in joint health and bone strength.

name: Hyderabadi Khichdi
description: A comforting one-pot meal of rice and moong dal, cooked with ghee and mild spices. This wholesome dish is garnished with caramelized onions and is perfect for those seeking a light yet satisfying meal.
health_benefits: Good source of protein and fiber from rice and dal. Contains essential minerals. The ghee provides healthy fats. Helps in digestion and provides sustained energy.

name: Shahi Tukda
description: A royal dessert made with golden-fried bread slices soaked in cardamom-scented sugar syrup, topped with thickened milk, and garnished with nuts. This indulgent treat is a perfect blend of crispy and creamy textures.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains healthy fats from nuts. Good source of carbohydrates. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Hyderabadi Nihari
description: A robust breakfast stew of slow-cooked meat in a thick, spiced gravy. This royal dish is cooked overnight until the meat is tender and falls off the bone, creating a rich, flavorful curry perfect with hot naan bread.
health_benefits: High in protein from mutton. Contains essential minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle building and provides energy.

name: Badam Ki Jali
description: An intricate Hyderabadi sweet made with ground almonds, sugar, and cardamom, crafted into a delicate lattice pattern. This royal dessert is infused with saffron and requires great skill to prepare its signature net-like appearance.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and healthy fats from almonds. Contains essential minerals. The saffron has antioxidant properties. Helps in brain function and heart health.

name: Hyderabadi Kheema
description: A flavorful preparation of minced meat cooked with aromatic spices, onions, and tomatoes. This versatile dish can be enjoyed with rice, roti, or as a filling for various breads and is a staple in Hyderabadi cuisine.
health_benefits: Good source of protein from minced meat. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle maintenance and provides energy.

name: Doodh Ka Sherbet
description: A refreshing milk-based beverage enriched with nuts, cardamom, and rose water. This cooling drink is often served during summer months and special occasions, garnished with chopped nuts and a touch of saffron.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains healthy fats from nuts. The cardamom aids digestion. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Hyderabadi Korma
description: A luxurious curry made with tender meat pieces cooked in a rich gravy of yogurt, ground nuts, and aromatic spices. This mild yet flavorful dish is a perfect example of Hyderabadi's Nawabi cuisine.
health_benefits: High in protein from mutton. Contains probiotics from yogurt. The cashews provide healthy fats. Helps in muscle building and gut health.

name: Khubani Ka Sharbat
description: A refreshing summer drink made with fresh apricots, mint leaves, and a hint of lemon. This sweet and tangy beverage is known for its cooling properties and is often served during hot summer days in Hyderabad.
health_benefits: Rich in vitamin A and fiber from apricots. Contains antioxidants. The mint aids digestion. Helps in eye health and provides hydration.

name: Hyderabadi Baingan Ka Salan
description: A classic Hyderabadi curry where baby eggplants are simmered in a rich, nutty gravy made with peanuts, sesame seeds, and coconut. This dish is a perfect accompaniment to biryani and is known for its complex flavors.
health_benefits: Rich in fiber and antioxidants from eggplant. Contains healthy fats from peanuts and sesame. The tamarind provides vitamin C. Helps in heart health and digestion.

name: Badam Ki Kheer
description: A luxurious dessert made with ground almonds cooked in creamy milk, flavored with cardamom and saffron. This royal sweet dish is garnished with slivered almonds and is often served during special occasions.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and healthy fats from almonds. Contains calcium from milk. The saffron has antioxidant properties. Helps in brain function and bone health.

name: Hyderabadi Gosht Ki Biryani
description: A legendary rice dish where tender pieces of mutton are layered with fragrant long-grain rice, aromatic spices, and fresh herbs. This royal preparation is slow-cooked in the dum style, allowing the flavors to meld perfectly.
health_benefits: High in protein from mutton. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle building and provides sustained energy.

name: Falooda
description: A grand dessert drink layered with rose-flavored milk, vermicelli, basil seeds, and topped with ice cream. This cooling dessert is garnished with nuts and is perfect for hot summer days or festive celebrations.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium from milk. Contains protein from vermicelli. The basil seeds provide fiber. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Hyderabadi Dum Ka Murgh
description: A rich chicken curry where marinated pieces are slow-cooked with yogurt, brown onions, and aromatic spices in the dum style. This royal dish is known for its tender meat and thick, flavorful gravy.
health_benefits: High in protein from chicken. Contains probiotics from yogurt. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle building and gut health.

name: Hyderabadi Chai
description: A unique blend of tea brewed with milk, cardamom, and fresh ginger. This aromatic chai is known for its strong flavor and is an integral part of Hyderabadi culture, often enjoyed with local snacks and conversations.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from tea. The ginger aids digestion. The cardamom has anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in metabolism and provides energy.

name: Uttapam
description: A thick, fluffy South Indian pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, topped with onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. Often called the 'Indian pizza', it's served with coconut chutney and sambar.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and fiber from rice and lentils. Contains essential minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides energy and helps in muscle maintenance.

name: Pongal
description: A comforting South Indian dish made with rice and moong dal, seasoned with black pepper, cumin, and curry leaves. This savory breakfast dish is traditionally served with coconut chutney and sambar.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and fiber from moong dal. Contains essential minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Filter Coffee
description: Traditional South Indian coffee made by brewing fresh ground coffee using a metal filter, mixed with hot milk and sugar. Known for its strong aroma and rich taste, it's served in a distinctive brass tumbler and bowl.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from coffee. The milk provides calcium. Helps in metabolism and provides energy. May improve focus and alertness.

name: Nannari Sherbet
description: A cooling summer drink made from the roots of Indian Sarsaparilla, known for its distinctive dark color and medicinal properties. This refreshing beverage is sweetened with palm sugar and often served with basil seeds.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants from nannari root. Contains essential minerals. The basil seeds provide fiber. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Vada
description: Crispy, donut-shaped fritters made from fermented black gram batter, flavored with onions, green chilies, and curry leaves. These savory snacks are a popular breakfast item and tea-time treat across South India.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and fiber from urad dal. Contains essential minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides energy and helps in muscle maintenance.

name: Panagam
description: A traditional South Indian summer drink made with jaggery, dry ginger powder, and cardamom. This sweet and spicy beverage is known for its cooling properties and is often served during Ram Navami festival.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants from jaggery. Contains essential minerals. The cardamom has anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Rasam
description: A tangy, spicy South Indian soup made with tamarind, tomatoes, and a special blend of spices. Known for its digestive properties, it can be enjoyed as a soup or paired with rice.
health_benefits: Rich in antioxidants from tomatoes. Contains essential minerals. The tamarind provides vitamin C. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Paruppu Payasam
description: A rich South Indian dessert made with moong dal, jaggery, and coconut milk, flavored with cardamom. This creamy pudding is often prepared during festivals and special occasions.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and fiber from moong dal. Contains healthy fats from coconut milk. The cardamom has anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Plain Dosa
description: A crispy, golden rice and lentil crepe filled with a savory spiced potato masala. Served hot with coconut chutney and tangy sambar, it's a breakfast favorite across India.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and fiber from lentils. Contains essential minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides energy and helps in muscle maintenance.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A refreshing yogurt-based drink made with ripe mangoes, sugar, and a touch of cardamom. This creamy, sweet beverage is perfect for hot summer days and pairs well with spicy Indian dishes.
health_benefits: Rich in probiotics, calcium, and vitamin C. Helps in digestion and provides energy. May improve skin health and boost immunity.

name: Kulfi Falooda
description: A royal dessert drink featuring traditional Indian ice cream (kulfi) served with vermicelli, rose syrup, and basil seeds. Topped with nuts and dried fruits, it's a decadent treat perfect for special occasions.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium from milk. Contains protein from vermicelli. The nuts provide healthy fats. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Masala Chai
description: A spiced Indian tea made by brewing black tea with milk, ginger, cardamom, and other aromatic spices. This warming beverage is a daily ritual for many Indians and is known for its comforting aroma and taste.
health_benefits: Contains antioxidants from tea. The ginger aids digestion. The cardamom has anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in metabolism and provides energy.

name: Jalebi
description: Crispy, spiral-shaped sweet made from deep-fried batter soaked in sugar syrup. These golden-orange treats are crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, often served hot with rabri or enjoyed as a standalone dessert.
health_benefits: Provides quick energy from carbohydrates. The sugar syrup contains minerals. Best consumed in moderation. Helps in providing instant energy.

name: Pani Puri
description: A popular street food consisting of crispy hollow puris filled with spiced potato mixture and tangy tamarind water. This interactive snack is known for its burst of flavors and textures in every bite.
health_benefits: Low in calories. Contains fiber from potatoes and chickpeas. The mint water aids digestion. The tamarind provides vitamin C. Helps in hydration and digestion.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft, spongy milk-solid balls soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup. These melt-in-the-mouth sweets are a favorite at festivals and celebrations, known for their rich, sweet taste and delicate texture.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium and protein from milk solids. Contains healthy fats from ghee. Best consumed in moderation. Helps in providing energy and maintaining bone health.

name: Thandai
description: A cooling drink made with milk, nuts, and aromatic spices. Traditionally served during Holi festival, this refreshing beverage is known for its rich, nutty flavor and cooling properties.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains healthy fats from nuts. The saffron has antioxidant properties. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Kachori
description: Crispy, flaky pastries filled with spiced lentil or potato mixture. These deep-fried snacks are popular across India, with each region having its own unique variation of fillings and flavors.
health_benefits: Good source of protein from moong dal. Contains complex carbohydrates from flour. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle maintenance and provides energy.

name: Rabri
description: A rich, creamy dessert made by slow-cooking milk until it thickens and develops a distinct caramelized flavor. Topped with nuts and cardamom, this traditional sweet is often served with jalebi or enjoyed on its own.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains healthy fats from nuts. The saffron has antioxidant properties. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Egg Curry
description: A creamy and flavorful egg curry made with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of spices. This dish is a popular choice for breakfast and is known for its rich, savory taste.
health_benefits: Excellent source of protein from eggs. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The tomatoes provide vitamin C. Helps in muscle building and provides energy.

name: Kesar Pista Kulfi
description: A traditional Indian ice cream made with saffron and pistachios. This rich, dense frozen dessert is known for its intense flavors and creamy texture, often served on a stick or in small earthen pots.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium from milk. Contains healthy fats from nuts. The saffron has antioxidant properties. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Masala Soda
description: A refreshing carbonated drink spiced with black salt, cumin, and mint. This unique beverage combines the fizz of soda with traditional Indian spices, creating a cooling and digestive drink.
health_benefits: The black salt provides minerals. The mint aids digestion. The cumin has anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in digestion and provides hydration.

name: Malai Sandwich
description: A rich, creamy sandwich made with layers of fresh cream, nuts, and cardamom. This indulgent snack is popular in Mumbai's street food scene, known for its unique combination of textures and flavors.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium from cream. Contains healthy fats from nuts. The cardamom aids digestion. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Kesar Badam Milk
description: A rich, creamy milk drink flavored with saffron and almonds. This nourishing beverage is often served warm and is known for its health benefits and luxurious taste.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains healthy fats from almonds. The saffron has antioxidant properties. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Rose Milk
description: A fragrant milk drink flavored with rose syrup and cardamom. This cooling beverage is popular during summer months and is known for its beautiful pink color and delicate floral taste.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium from milk. The rose syrup contains antioxidants. The cardamom aids digestion. Helps in bone health and provides hydration.

name: Thal
description: A traditional Indian snack made with a crispy outer layer and a soft, spiced filling. This savory treat is popular across India and is known for its unique combination of textures and flavors.
health_benefits: Contains complex carbohydrates from bread. The vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in providing energy and maintaining gut health.

name: Kheer
description: A creamy and sweet dessert made with rice or vermicelli, milk, and sugar. This comforting dessert is popular across India and is known for its rich, creamy texture and sweet flavor.
health_benefits: Rich in calcium and protein from milk. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice. The cardamom aids digestion. Helps in bone health and provides energy.

name: Kaju Katli
description: A traditional Indian dessert made with cashews, sugar, and cardamom. This sweet treat is popular across India and is known for its rich, creamy texture and sweet flavor.
health_benefits: Rich in healthy fats from cashews. Contains protein and minerals. The cardamom aids digestion. Helps in heart health and provides energy.

name: south indian thali
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Complete meal with balanced nutrition. Contains protein from curries, carbohydrates from rice, and fiber from vegetables. The variety ensures intake of essential vitamins and minerals. Helps in maintaining overall health.

name: North Indian thali
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Complete meal with balanced nutrition. Contains protein from curries, carbohydrates from rice, and fiber from vegetables. The variety ensures intake of essential vitamins and minerals. Helps in maintaining overall health.

name: Rosted Chicken
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: High in protein from chicken. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle building and provides sustained energy.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from chicken. Contains essential vitamins and minerals from spices and vegetables. The tomatoes provide vitamin C. Helps in muscle maintenance and immune support.

name: Chicken Tikka
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: High in protein from chicken. Contains healthy fats and essential minerals. The spices have antioxidant properties. Helps in muscle building and supports metabolism.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from chicken. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Provides sustained energy and supports muscle health.

name: Chicken Kebab
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: High in protein from chicken. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The spices have antioxidant properties. Helps in muscle building and provides energy.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Good source of protein from chicken and eggs. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice. The vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. Helps in muscle maintenance and provides energy.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Excellent source of protein from eggs. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice. The vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. Helps in muscle building and supports metabolism.

name: Pappu
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Source of calcium and protein

name: Sambar Rice
description: A traditional Indian meal served on a large, circular wooden plate. It typically includes a variety of dishes, including rice, curries, vegetables, and desserts, and is a popular choice for lunch or dinner.
health_benefits: Source of calcium and protein

name: Curd Rice
description: A Rice dish with curd with onions and tomatoes, smooth and creamy
health_benefits: Source of calcium and protein

name: Masala Dosa
description: Masala Dosa is a beloved South Indian breakfast dish made from a fermented rice and urad dal batter, cooked into a thin, crispy crepe. The dosa is filled with a mildly spiced potato masala made with mashed potatoes, sautéed onions, mustard seeds, curry leaves, and turmeric. It is traditionally served hot with coconut chutney, tangy sambar (a lentil-based vegetable stew), and sometimes tomato chutney. Its savory, crispy, and hearty nature makes it both comforting and satisfying.
health_benefits: Rich in protein, fiber, and iron. The fermented batter aids digestion and provides probiotics. The combination of rice and lentils offers complete protein. Low in fat and helps maintain blood sugar levels.
ingredients: Fermented rice and urad dal batter

name: Sushi
description: Sushi is a traditional Japanese dish featuring vinegared rice combined with various ingredients such as raw or cooked seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits. It is often accompanied by soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
health_benefits: High in protein and omega-3 fatty acids; low in saturated fat.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Tacos al Pastor are a popular Mexican street food featuring thinly sliced pork marinated in a blend of dried chilies, spices, and pineapple, then cooked on a vertical spit and served on small corn tortillas with onions, cilantro, and a slice of pineapple.
health_benefits: Provides protein and essential vitamins; moderation recommended due to fat content.

name: Croissant
description: A croissant is a buttery, flaky, and crescent-shaped pastry of Austrian origin, perfected in France. Made from a layered yeast-leavened dough, it's a staple of French bakeries and breakfast tables.
health_benefits: Provides carbohydrates and fats; best enjoyed in moderation.

name: Pho
description: Pho is a Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, usually beef or chicken. It's a popular street food in Vietnam and known for its aromatic and flavorful broth.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and minerals; the broth is hydrating and nourishing.

name: Poutine
description: Poutine is a Canadian dish originating from Quebec, consisting of French fries topped with cheese curds and smothered in brown gravy. It's a comfort food favorite across Canada.
health_benefits: High in calories; provides carbohydrates and calcium.

name: Pizza
description: Pizza is a savory dish of Italian origin, featuring a round, flat bread topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various ingredients such as meats, vegetables, and herbs.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and carbohydrates; provides energy and fiber.

name: Pad Thai
description: Pad Thai is a popular Thai dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, vegetables, and a mix of meats, typically chicken or shrimp, with a tangy sauce of fish sauce, sugar, and tamarind. It's a favorite street food in Thailand.
health_benefits: Rich in protein and carbohydrates; provides energy and fiber.

name: Bánh Mì
description: Bánh Mì is a Vietnamese sandwich that combines a crispy French baguette with savory ingredients like marinated pork, pickled vegetables, fresh herbs, and spicy chili sauce. This fusion of French and Vietnamese flavors creates a unique and satisfying street food experience.
health_benefits: Provides a balance of carbohydrates, proteins, and fresh vegetables.

name: Churros
description: Churros are a popular Spanish and Latin American snack made from fried dough pastry, often sprinkled with sugar and served with a side of thick hot chocolate for dipping. They are crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, making them a delightful treat.
health_benefits: High in carbohydrates; best enjoyed in moderation.

name: Falafel
description: Falafel is a Middle Eastern dish consisting of deep-fried balls made from ground chickpeas or fava beans, mixed with herbs and spices. Often served in pita bread with salads, pickled vegetables, and tahini sauce, it's a popular vegetarian street food.
health_benefits: High in protein and fiber; suitable for vegan diets.

name: Pani Puri
description: Pani Puri is a popular Indian street snack consisting of hollow, crispy puris filled with a mixture of flavored water, tamarind chutney, chili, chaat masala, potato, onion, or chickpeas. It's known for its burst of flavors and textures in every bite.
health_benefits: Low in calories; offers a mix of carbohydrates and fiber.

name: Takoyaki
description: Takoyaki is a popular Japanese street food made of batter filled with diced octopus, tempura scraps, pickled ginger, and green onion, cooked in a special molded pan. These savory balls are brushed with takoyaki sauce and mayonnaise, then sprinkled with green laver and dried bonito flakes.
health_benefits: Provides protein from octopus; moderate in calories.

name: Pierogi
description: Pierogi are a traditional Polish dish made of savory or sweet pastries filled with a variety of ingredients such as potatoes, cheese, mushrooms, or fruit. They are often served with a side of sour cream or butter.
health_benefits: Rich in carbohydrates and protein from potatoes and cheese.

name: Paella
description: A traditional Spanish rice dish originating from Valencia, featuring saffron-infused rice cooked with seafood, chicken, and vegetables in a wide, shallow pan. The dish is known for its vibrant colors and rich flavors.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from seafood and chicken. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice. The saffron has antioxidant properties. The vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. Helps in muscle building and provides sustained energy.

name: Moussaka
description: A layered Greek casserole dish made with eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce. This hearty dish combines Mediterranean flavors with rich, creamy textures.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from meat and dairy. Contains fiber from eggplant. The olive oil provides healthy fats. The tomatoes offer vitamin C. Helps in muscle maintenance and heart health.

name: Ramen
description: A Japanese noodle soup dish featuring wheat noodles in a rich broth, topped with various ingredients like sliced pork, soft-boiled egg, nori, and green onions.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from pork and eggs. Contains complex carbohydrates from noodles. The broth provides minerals and collagen. The vegetables offer vitamins and fiber. Helps in muscle building and joint health.

name: Shakshuka
description: A Middle Eastern breakfast dish featuring eggs poached in a spicy tomato sauce with peppers, onions, and various spices. This hearty dish is often served with crusty bread.
health_benefits: Excellent source of protein from eggs. Rich in lycopene from tomatoes. Contains fiber from vegetables. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Helps in muscle building and heart health.

name: Bibimbap
description: A Korean rice bowl dish topped with various vegetables, meat, and a fried egg, served with gochujang sauce. The ingredients are arranged in a colorful pattern and mixed before eating.
health_benefits: Well-balanced meal with protein, carbohydrates, and vegetables. Rich in fiber and vitamins. The gochujang provides antioxidants. The vegetables offer various minerals. Helps in maintaining overall health.

name: Ceviche
description: A fresh seafood dish from Peru, featuring raw fish cured in citrus juices and spiced with chili peppers. The dish is typically garnished with onions, cilantro, and served with sweet potato and corn.
health_benefits: Excellent source of lean protein from fish. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids. The citrus provides vitamin C. The vegetables offer fiber and antioxidants. Helps in heart health and immune support.

name: Goulash
description: A traditional Hungarian stew made with tender beef, vegetables, and paprika. This hearty dish is known for its rich, warming flavors and is often served with bread or dumplings.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from beef. Contains vitamins from vegetables. The paprika provides antioxidants. The slow cooking preserves nutrients. Helps in muscle building and immune support.

name: Pad See Ew
description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with wide rice noodles, Chinese broccoli, and your choice of protein, all tossed in a sweet soy sauce.
health_benefits: Good source of protein from meat. Contains complex carbohydrates from noodles. The vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. The soy sauce offers minerals. Helps in muscle maintenance and energy.

name: Ratatouille
description: A classic French vegetable stew made with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes, seasoned with herbs de Provence. This colorful dish celebrates summer vegetables.
health_benefits: Rich in fiber from vegetables. Contains antioxidants from tomatoes and peppers. The olive oil provides healthy fats. The herbs offer various health benefits. Helps in heart health and digestion.

name: Feijoada
description: Brazil's national dish, a hearty black bean stew with various cuts of pork and beef. Traditionally served with rice, collard greens, and orange slices.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from meat. Contains fiber from black beans. The collard greens provide vitamins. The orange offers vitamin C. Helps in muscle building and iron absorption.

name: Fish and Chips
description: A classic British dish featuring crispy battered fish served with golden, fluffy chips. Traditionally wrapped in newspaper, it's a beloved comfort food across the UK.
health_benefits: Good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids from fish. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The potatoes provide complex carbohydrates and fiber.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A British-Indian fusion dish featuring tender chicken pieces in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce. Created in the UK, it's now one of Britain's national dishes.
health_benefits: High in protein from chicken. Contains antioxidants from tomatoes and spices. The yogurt provides calcium and probiotics.

name: New York Cheesecake
description: A rich, creamy dessert with a buttery graham cracker crust and smooth cream cheese filling. Topped with fresh berries or fruit compote, it's an iconic American dessert.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium and protein from cream cheese. Contains antioxidants if topped with berries.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai stir-fried rice noodle dish with tofu, shrimp, peanuts, egg, and bean sprouts. Tossed in a sweet and savory tamarind sauce, it's a perfect balance of flavors.
health_benefits: Good source of protein and fiber. Contains healthy fats from peanuts. The vegetables provide essential vitamins and minerals.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An elegant Japanese dish featuring fresh fish, rice, and vegetables. Includes various types of nigiri, maki rolls, and sashimi, served with wasabi, pickled ginger, and soy sauce.
health_benefits: Excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids and protein. Low in fat and calories. Contains essential minerals and vitamins.

name: Butter Chicken
description: A classic North Indian dish featuring tender chicken pieces in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy. The dish is known for its smooth texture and perfect balance of spices.
health_benefits: Good source of protein from chicken. Contains healthy fats from butter and cream. The tomatoes provide vitamin C. Helps in muscle maintenance and provides energy.

name: Fish and Chips
description: A classic British dish featuring battered and deep-fried fish served with crispy chips. Traditionally wrapped in newspaper, it's a beloved comfort food across the UK.
health_benefits: Good source of protein and omega-3 from fish. Contains carbohydrates from potatoes. The frying process provides energy-dense food.

name: New York Cheesecake
description: A rich and creamy dessert featuring a smooth cream cheese filling on a graham cracker crust. Topped with various fruits or sauces, it's a classic American dessert.
health_benefits: Good source of calcium and protein from cream cheese. Contains carbohydrates from the crust. Provides energy and helps in bone health.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish featuring rice noodles, eggs, tofu, and peanuts. Known for its perfect balance of sweet, sour, and savory flavors.
health_benefits: Good source of protein from eggs and tofu. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice noodles. The peanuts provide healthy fats. Helps in muscle maintenance and provides energy.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: A fragrant Kashmiri curry made with tender mutton pieces cooked in a rich gravy of yogurt, onions, and aromatic spices like fennel and ginger. This dish is known for its deep red color and robust flavors.
health_benefits: High in protein from mutton which aids muscle growth and repair. The yogurt provides probiotics for gut health. Ginger and garlic have anti-inflammatory properties. The spices like fennel aid digestion. Rich in iron which helps prevent anemia.

name: Avocado Toast
description: A healthy breakfast option featuring mashed ripe avocado on toasted artisanal bread, topped with cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, and a drizzle of olive oil. Often garnished with chili flakes and microgreens.
health_benefits: Rich in heart-healthy monounsaturated fats from avocado. Provides fiber from whole grain bread. The olive oil contains antioxidants. Feta cheese offers calcium. Tomatoes provide lycopene which supports heart health. Helps maintain healthy cholesterol levels.

name: Beef Wellington
description: A classic British dish featuring beef tenderloin wrapped in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles and prosciutto. The pastry turns golden and flaky while the beef remains perfectly medium-rare.
health_benefits: Excellent source of high-quality protein from beef tenderloin. Mushrooms provide selenium and vitamin D. The pastry offers carbohydrates for energy. Contains iron which supports oxygen transport in blood. Moderate portion provides balanced nutrition.

name: Chicken Shawarma
description: Middle Eastern street food featuring marinated chicken cooked on a vertical rotisserie, thinly sliced and served in pita bread with garlic sauce, pickles, and fresh vegetables.
health_benefits: Lean protein from chicken aids muscle maintenance. The marinade contains turmeric and garlic which have anti-inflammatory properties. Vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. Tahini offers healthy fats. Balanced meal when served with whole wheat pita.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
description: A Korean comfort food made with day-old rice stir-fried with kimchi, vegetables, and often topped with a fried egg. The fermented kimchi gives this dish its signature tangy, spicy flavor.
health_benefits: Kimchi provides probiotics for gut health. Rice offers complex carbohydrates for energy. The fermentation process increases vitamin B and K content. Eggs add high-quality protein. Contains capsaicin from chili which may boost metabolism.

name: Lobster Thermidor
description: A classic French dish featuring lobster meat cooked in a rich cream sauce with brandy, mustard, and cheese, then stuffed back into the shell and broiled until golden.
health_benefits: Excellent source of lean protein from lobster. Contains omega-3 fatty acids which support heart health. The cheese provides calcium. Brandy may help digestion in small amounts. Rich in selenium which supports immune function.

name: Miso Ramen
description: A Japanese noodle soup featuring wheat noodles in a rich miso-based broth, topped with chashu pork, soft-boiled egg, corn, and bean sprouts. The fermented miso gives the broth its distinctive umami flavor.
health_benefits: Miso provides probiotics for gut health. Pork offers high-quality protein. Eggs contain essential amino acids. The broth is hydrating and rich in minerals. Fermented foods may support immune function.

name: Prawn Balchao
description: A spicy Goan dish featuring prawns cooked in a tangy, vinegary sauce with red chilies and aromatic spices. This pickle-like preparation has bold flavors that develop when stored.
health_benefits: Prawns provide lean protein and omega-3 fatty acids. Vinegar may help with digestion. Chili peppers contain capsaicin which may boost metabolism. Garlic has antimicrobial properties. The fermentation process increases bioavailability of nutrients.

name: Quinoa Salad
description: A nutritious salad made with protein-rich quinoa, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and a lemon-tahini dressing. Often topped with nuts or seeds for crunch.
health_benefits: Quinoa is a complete protein containing all essential amino acids. Avocado provides heart-healthy fats. Tahini offers calcium and magnesium. The salad is rich in fiber which supports digestion. Contains antioxidants from colorful vegetables.

name: Ribeye Steak
description: A premium cut of beef known for its rich marbling, cooked to perfection and served with compound butter. The fat content gives this steak its exceptional flavor and tenderness.
health_benefits: Excellent source of high-quality protein and iron. Contains conjugated linoleic acid (CLA) from grass-fed beef which may have health benefits. Rich in B vitamins which support energy metabolism. The fat content provides sustained energy.

name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: A Japanese-inspired dish featuring salmon fillets glazed with a sweet-savory teriyaki sauce. The salmon is pan-seared to perfection, resulting in crispy skin and tender flesh.
health_benefits: Salmon is rich in omega-3 fatty acids which support heart and brain health. The protein content aids muscle maintenance. Contains vitamin D which supports bone health. The sauce provides umami flavor with moderate sugar content.

name: Tandoori Paneer Tikka
description: Cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) marinated in yogurt and spices, then cooked in a tandoor (clay oven). The high heat gives the paneer a smoky flavor and charred exterior.
health_benefits: Paneer provides high-quality vegetarian protein and calcium. Yogurt contains probiotics for gut health. The spices like turmeric have anti-inflammatory properties. Cooking in tandoor reduces need for excess oil. Rich in phosphorus which supports bone health.

name: Udon Noodle Soup
description: A Japanese comfort food featuring thick wheat noodles in a delicate dashi-based broth, topped with tempura, green onions, and kamaboko fish cake. The chewy noodles are satisfying in cold weather.
health_benefits: Udon noodles provide complex carbohydrates for energy. The dashi broth is rich in minerals. Tempura adds protein when included. Low in fat compared to ramen. Contains some fiber from the thick noodles. The warm broth is hydrating.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: A nourishing bowl featuring quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, kale, avocado, chickpeas, and tahini dressing. The colorful ingredients provide a variety of textures and flavors in each bite.
health_benefits: Quinoa and chickpeas provide complete plant-based protein. Sweet potatoes offer vitamin A. Kale is rich in vitamin K. Avocado provides healthy fats. Tahini offers calcium. The variety ensures intake of diverse nutrients. High in fiber which supports digestion.

name: Wagyu Beef Burger
description: A gourmet burger made with premium Wagyu beef patty, aged cheddar, caramelized onions, and truffle aioli on a brioche bun. The high marbling of Wagyu beef makes this burger exceptionally juicy and flavorful.
health_benefits: Wagyu beef contains higher levels of monounsaturated fats than regular beef. Provides high-quality protein. The cheese offers calcium. Contains iron which supports oxygen transport. Best enjoyed occasionally as part of balanced diet.

name: Xiaolongbao
description: Shanghai soup dumplings featuring delicate dough wrapped around pork filling and savory broth. The dumplings are steamed to perfection, creating a burst of flavorful soup when bitten into.
health_benefits: Pork provides protein and B vitamins. The broth contains collagen which may support joint health. Steaming preserves nutrients better than frying. Contains ginger which aids digestion. Moderate portion makes it balanced meal.

name: Yakitori
description: Japanese skewered chicken grilled over charcoal, featuring various cuts like thigh, breast, or liver. The skewers are basted with tare sauce (sweet soy glaze) during cooking for shiny, flavorful results.
health_benefits: Chicken provides lean protein. Grilling reduces fat content compared to frying. The sauce offers umami flavor with moderate sugar. Contains amino acids from the protein. Cooking over charcoal may add antioxidant compounds.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
description: A low-carb alternative to pasta featuring spiralized zucchini tossed with homemade basil pesto, cherry tomatoes, and pine nuts. The fresh ingredients create a light yet satisfying dish.
health_benefits: Zucchini is low in calories and rich in vitamin C. Basil in pesto contains antioxidants. Pine nuts provide healthy fats. Olive oil offers monounsaturated fats. Parmesan adds calcium. Much lower in carbohydrates than traditional pasta dishes.

name: Acai Bowl
description: A thick smoothie bowl made with acai berry puree, topped with granola, banana slices, and assorted berries. This Brazilian-inspired dish is both nutritious and visually appealing.
health_benefits: Acai berries are rich in antioxidants. The bowl provides fiber from fruits and granola. Contains healthy fats from acai and nuts. Berries offer vitamin C. The combination provides sustained energy without refined sugars when made properly.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: A classic French stew featuring beef slow-cooked in red wine with mushrooms, pearl onions, and bacon. The long cooking time develops deep, complex flavors in the rich sauce.
health_benefits: Beef provides high-quality protein and iron. Red wine contains antioxidants like resveratrol. Mushrooms offer selenium. Slow cooking makes meat more digestible. The dish is rich in B vitamins which support energy metabolism.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent dessert featuring a small chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center. The cake is served warm, often with a scoop of vanilla ice cream that melts into the chocolate lava.
health_benefits: Dark chocolate contains antioxidants and may improve mood. Eggs provide protein. The small portion helps with portion control. Contains flavonoids which may support heart health. Best enjoyed occasionally as a treat.

name: Duck Confit
description: A French delicacy featuring duck legs slow-cooked in their own fat until tender, then crisped to perfection. The meat becomes incredibly flavorful and falls off the bone.
health_benefits: Duck provides high-quality protein and iron. The fat contains monounsaturated fats. Rich in B vitamins which support energy metabolism. The slow cooking makes the meat tender and digestible. Contains selenium which supports immune function.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: A classic breakfast dish featuring toasted English muffins topped with Canadian bacon, poached eggs, and rich hollandaise sauce. The combination of runny yolk and creamy sauce is irresistible.
health_benefits: Eggs provide high-quality protein and choline for brain health. Canadian bacon is leaner than regular bacon. Contains vitamin B12 which supports nerve function. The dish offers a balance of protein, fats, and carbohydrates. Best enjoyed occasionally due to rich sauce.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: A Middle Eastern street food featuring crispy falafel balls wrapped in pita bread with hummus, tahini sauce, and fresh vegetables. The combination of textures and flavors makes this a satisfying meal.
health_benefits: Falafel provides plant-based protein and fiber. Tahini offers healthy fats and calcium. Vegetables add vitamins and minerals. The whole wheat pita provides complex carbohydrates. Contains no cholesterol. Rich in iron from the chickpeas.

name: Gnocchi with Gorgonzola
description: Italian potato dumplings served in a creamy Gorgonzola cheese sauce with walnuts and sage. The pillowy gnocchi pairs perfectly with the bold blue cheese flavor.
health_benefits: Potatoes provide potassium and vitamin C. Gorgonzola offers calcium and protein. Walnuts contain omega-3 fatty acids. The dish is rich in B vitamins. Contains probiotics from the aged cheese. Best enjoyed in moderation due to richness.

name: Honey Glazed Salmon
description: Salmon fillet glazed with a sweet and tangy honey-mustard sauce, baked to perfection. The glaze caramelizes during cooking, creating a delicious crust on the tender fish.
health_benefits: Salmon is rich in omega-3 fatty acids which support heart and brain health. Honey contains antioxidants. Mustard may help with digestion. The dish provides high-quality protein. Contains vitamin D which supports bone health. Low in saturated fats.

name: Irish Stew
description: A hearty traditional stew made with lamb, potatoes, carrots, and onions in a rich broth. This comforting dish is perfect for cold weather and develops flavor when made ahead.
health_benefits: Lamb provides high-quality protein and iron. Potatoes offer potassium and vitamin C. Carrots contain beta-carotene. The broth is hydrating and rich in minerals. Contains B vitamins which support energy metabolism. The slow cooking makes nutrients more bioavailable.

name: Jerk Chicken
description: A Jamaican specialty featuring chicken marinated in a spicy-sweet jerk seasoning, then grilled over pimento wood. The dish has a distinctive smoky flavor with a kick of heat.
health_benefits: Chicken provides lean protein. The marinade contains allspice which has antioxidant properties. Scotch bonnet peppers may boost metabolism. Grilling reduces fat content compared to frying. Contains capsaicin which may have anti-inflammatory effects.

name: Kale Caesar Salad
description: A modern twist on the classic Caesar salad, featuring massaged kale instead of romaine, with homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and shaved Parmesan. The kale holds up better to the dressing without wilting.
health_benefits: Kale is rich in vitamins K, A, and C. Contains fiber which supports digestion. Parmesan provides calcium. The dressing offers healthy fats from olive oil. Massaging the kale makes its nutrients more bioavailable. Contains antioxidants from the greens.

name: Lamb Vindaloo
description: A fiery Goan curry featuring tender lamb pieces in a spicy, vinegary sauce with potatoes. This dish has Portuguese influences and is known for its intense heat and bold flavors.
health_benefits: Lamb provides high-quality protein and iron. Vinegar may aid digestion. Chili peppers contain capsaicin which may boost metabolism. Potatoes offer potassium. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Best enjoyed in moderation due to heat.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy Italian rice dish made with Arborio rice, mushrooms, white wine, and Parmesan cheese. The constant stirring releases the rice's starch, creating a luxurious texture.
health_benefits: Mushrooms provide selenium and vitamin D. Arborio rice offers complex carbohydrates. Parmesan contains calcium. White wine adds antioxidants. The dish is rich in umami flavors. Contains some fiber from the mushrooms.

name: Nasi Goreng
description: Indonesian fried rice cooked with sweet soy sauce, shrimp paste, and various toppings like fried egg and prawn crackers. This flavorful dish is often considered Indonesia's national dish.
health_benefits: Rice provides complex carbohydrates. Eggs offer high-quality protein. The dish contains various vegetables for fiber and vitamins. Shrimp paste provides umami flavor with minimal additions. The chili may boost metabolism. Balanced when served with protein and vegetables.

name: Osso Buco
description: An Italian Milanese specialty of cross-cut veal shanks braised with vegetables, white wine, and broth. The dish is traditionally garnished with gremolata and served with risotto alla milanese.
health_benefits: Veal provides high-quality protein and iron. The marrow contains nutrients like vitamin B12. White wine adds antioxidants. The slow cooking makes the meat tender and digestible. Contains collagen which may support joint health. Rich in zinc which supports immune function.

name: Peking Duck
description: A famous Chinese dish featuring crispy duck skin served with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and scallions. The duck is traditionally inflated with air before roasting to separate the skin from the fat.
health_benefits: Duck provides protein and iron. The skin contains collagen when properly prepared. Scallions offer vitamins A and C. The pancakes provide complex carbohydrates. Hoisin sauce adds umami flavor. Best enjoyed in moderation due to richness.

name: Quiche Lorraine
description: A French tart featuring a buttery crust filled with custard, bacon, and cheese. The dish originates from the Lorraine region and is equally delicious served warm or at room temperature.
health_benefits: Eggs provide high-quality protein and choline. Cheese offers calcium. The crust provides carbohydrates for energy. Contains B vitamins which support energy metabolism. Best enjoyed in moderation due to richness.

name: Risotto ai Funghi
description: A creamy Italian rice dish made with Arborio rice and wild mushrooms. The constant stirring releases the rice's starch, creating a luxurious texture without the need for heavy cream.
health_benefits: Arborio rice provides complex carbohydrates. Mushrooms offer selenium and vitamin D. Parmesan contains calcium. White wine adds antioxidants. The dish is naturally creamy without heavy cream. Contains some fiber from the mushrooms.

name: Spanakopita
description: A Greek savory pastry featuring spinach and feta cheese wrapped in crispy phyllo dough. The layers of flaky phyllo create a delightful contrast with the creamy filling.
health_benefits: Spinach is rich in iron and vitamin K. Feta cheese provides calcium. Phyllo dough is lower in fat than puff pastry. Contains antioxidants from the greens. The dish offers a balance of protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats.

name: Tandoori Chicken Pizza
description: A fusion dish featuring naan bread topped with tandoori chicken, bell peppers, onions, and mozzarella cheese. The combination of Indian and Italian flavors creates a unique taste experience.
health_benefits: Chicken provides lean protein. Bell peppers offer vitamin C. Onions contain antioxidants. The naan provides complex carbohydrates. Cheese offers calcium. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Best enjoyed in moderation due to richness.

name: Ube Halaya
description: A Filipino dessert made from purple yam, coconut milk, and condensed milk. The vibrant purple dessert has a sweet, earthy flavor and creamy texture, often served chilled.
health_benefits: Purple yam is rich in antioxidants and fiber. Coconut milk provides healthy fats. Contains some potassium and vitamin C. The natural purple color comes from anthocyanins which have antioxidant properties. Best enjoyed in moderation due to sugar content.

name: Vindaloo Pork Ribs
description: A Goan-inspired dish featuring pork ribs marinated in spicy vindaloo paste and slow-cooked until tender. The dish combines Portuguese and Indian flavors with a fiery kick.
health_benefits: Pork provides protein and B vitamins. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Slow cooking makes the meat tender and digestible. Contains capsaicin which may boost metabolism. Best enjoyed in moderation due to heat.

name: Wonton Soup
description: A Chinese comfort soup featuring delicate pork and shrimp wontons in a clear, flavorful broth. The wontons are wrapped in thin dough and cooked until they float to the surface.
health_benefits: Pork and shrimp provide protein. The broth is hydrating and rich in minerals. Contains ginger which aids digestion. Low in fat compared to fried wontons. The greens offer vitamins and fiber. A balanced, light meal option.

name: Xacuti
description: A Goan curry featuring chicken or lamb in a complex spice paste with coconut. The dish has a rich, dark color and layered flavors from the numerous spices in the masala.
health_benefits: Chicken or lamb provides protein and iron. Coconut offers healthy fats. The spices have various health benefits including anti-inflammatory properties. Contains antioxidants from the spice blend. The dish is rich in B vitamins.

name: Yorkshire Pudding
description: A British side dish made from a simple batter of eggs, flour, and milk, baked until puffy and golden. Traditionally served with roast beef and gravy.
health_benefits: Eggs provide protein and choline. The dish offers carbohydrates for energy. Contains some B vitamins. When made with quality ingredients, it can be part of balanced meal. Best enjoyed in moderation due to richness.

name: Zucchini Blossom Fritters
description: A seasonal Italian delicacy featuring delicate zucchini flowers stuffed with ricotta and herbs, then lightly battered and fried. The blossoms have a subtle squash flavor.
health_benefits: Zucchini blossoms are low in calories. Ricotta provides calcium and protein. The light frying preserves some nutrients. Contains some antioxidants from the herbs. Best enjoyed in moderation due to frying.

name: Apple Crumble
description: A classic British dessert featuring spiced apples topped with a buttery crumble mixture, baked until golden. Often served with custard or vanilla ice cream.
health_benefits: Apples provide fiber and vitamin C. The spices have antioxidant properties. Contains some B vitamins from the flour. Best enjoyed in moderation as a dessert. The fiber helps moderate sugar absorption.

name: Baked Alaska
description: A dramatic dessert featuring ice cream encased in sponge cake and covered with toasted meringue. The contrast of hot meringue and cold ice cream makes this a showstopper.
health_benefits: Egg whites in meringue provide protein. The dessert offers carbohydrates for energy. Contains some calcium from ice cream. Best enjoyed occasionally as a special treat. The dramatic presentation enhances dining experience.

name: Chicken Satay
description: A Southeast Asian dish featuring marinated chicken skewers grilled over charcoal and served with peanut sauce. The chicken is tender and flavorful with a slightly charred exterior.
health_benefits: Chicken provides lean protein. The marinade contains turmeric which has anti-inflammatory properties. Peanut sauce offers healthy fats. Grilling reduces fat content compared to frying. Contains some fiber from the peanuts.

name: Duck à l'Orange
description: A classic French dish featuring roasted duck with a sweet-savory orange sauce. The acidity of the orange cuts through the richness of the duck for a balanced flavor profile.
health_benefits: Duck provides protein and iron. Oranges offer vitamin C. The sauce contains antioxidants from citrus. Rich in B vitamins which support energy metabolism. The dish is naturally gluten-free when prepared traditionally.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: An Italian-American dish featuring breaded and fried eggplant slices layered with tomato sauce and cheese, then baked until bubbly. The eggplant becomes tender and flavorful.
health_benefits: Eggplant provides fiber and antioxidants. Tomato sauce offers lycopene. Cheese provides calcium and protein. Contains some B vitamins. The dish is vegetarian but best enjoyed in moderation due to frying and cheese.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: A rich Italian pasta dish featuring fettuccine tossed in a creamy sauce made from butter and Parmesan cheese. The simple ingredients create a luxurious texture and flavor.
health_benefits: Pasta provides complex carbohydrates. Parmesan offers calcium and protein. The dish is naturally vegetarian. Contains some B vitamins. Best enjoyed in moderation due to richness. The simplicity allows quality ingredients to shine.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and San Marzano tomatoes
health_benefits: Rich in protein and carbohydrates from cheese and dough. Contains essential vitamins and minerals. The olive oil provides healthy fats. Helps in digestion and provides energy.

name: Aloo Gobi
description: A classic North Indian vegetarian dish made with potatoes (aloo) and cauliflower (gobi) cooked with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices like turmeric, cumin, and coriander.
health_benefits: Rich in fiber from vegetables. Contains antioxidants from spices. Potatoes provide potassium. Cauliflower offers vitamin C. Helps in digestion.

name: Baingan Bharta
description: Smoky mashed eggplant cooked with onions, tomatoes, garlic, and spices. The eggplant is traditionally roasted over open flame for authentic flavor.
health_benefits: Eggplant is low in calories and rich in fiber. Contains antioxidants. Tomatoes provide lycopene. Garlic has antimicrobial properties.

name: Chana Masala
description: Spicy chickpea curry cooked in a thick gravy with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices like garam masala, cumin, and coriander.
health_benefits: Chickpeas are rich in protein and fiber. Helps regulate blood sugar. Contains iron and folate. The spices aid digestion.

name: Dal Tadka
description: Yellow lentils tempered with ghee, cumin, garlic, and red chilies. A staple dish served in most Indian restaurants with a smoky flavor.
health_benefits: Lentils are excellent source of plant-based protein. Rich in fiber. The tempering aids digestion. Contains essential amino acids.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Creamy spinach curry with soft cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese). The spinach is blended into a smooth puree with garlic, ginger, and spices.
health_benefits: Spinach is rich in iron and vitamin K. Paneer provides calcium and protein. Contains antioxidants. Helps in bone health.

name: Rajma Chawal
description: Red kidney beans cooked in a thick onion-tomato gravy, served with steamed rice. A staple comfort food in North Indian households.
health_benefits: Kidney beans are rich in protein and fiber. Helps regulate cholesterol. Contains complex carbohydrates from rice. Provides sustained energy.

name: Sarson Ka Saag
description: Traditional Punjabi dish made from mustard greens, cooked slowly with spices and served with makki ki roti (cornmeal flatbread).
health_benefits: Mustard greens are rich in vitamins A, C, and K. Contains antioxidants. High in fiber. Supports immune function.

name: Methi Thepla
description: Gujarati flatbread made with whole wheat flour, fresh fenugreek leaves, and spices. Typically served with yogurt or pickle.
health_benefits: Fenugreek leaves help regulate blood sugar. Whole wheat provides fiber. Low in fat. Contains iron and protein.

name: Poha
description: Flattened rice cooked with onions, peanuts, curry leaves, and mild spices. A popular breakfast dish across Central India.
health_benefits: Light and easy to digest. Peanuts provide protein. Curry leaves aid digestion. Low in calories.

name: Upma
description: South Indian breakfast made from semolina cooked with vegetables, mustard seeds, and curry leaves. Often served with coconut chutney.
health_benefits: Semolina provides complex carbohydrates. Vegetables add fiber and vitamins. Light yet filling. Good energy booster.

name: Kachori
description: Flaky, deep-fried pastry filled with spiced lentil or potato mixture. A popular street food snack in Rajasthan and Uttar Pradesh.
health_benefits: Lentils provide protein. The spices aid digestion. Best enjoyed in moderation due to frying.

name: Dhokla
description: Steamed savory cake made from fermented rice and chickpea batter. A signature Gujarati snack served with green chutney.
health_benefits: Fermented food aids digestion. Chickpeas provide protein. Steaming makes it low in fat. Contains probiotics.

name: Bhelpuri
description: Mumbai's famous street food snack made with puffed rice, vegetables, tangy tamarind chutney, and sev (crispy gram flour noodles).
health_benefits: Puffed rice is low in calories. Vegetables provide fiber. Tamarind aids digestion. Best enjoyed fresh.

name: Mysore Pak
description: Rich South Indian sweet made from gram flour, ghee, and sugar. Originating from Mysore, it has a melt-in-the-mouth texture.
health_benefits: Gram flour provides protein. Ghee contains healthy fats. Best enjoyed in moderation due to high sugar content.

name: Gajar Ka Halwa
description: Carrot pudding made by slow-cooking grated carrots with milk, sugar, and ghee. Garnished with nuts and often served warm.
health_benefits: Carrots are rich in beta-carotene. Nuts provide healthy fats. Milk offers calcium. Contains antioxidants.

name: Rasmalai
description: Bengali dessert consisting of soft cheese dumplings soaked in sweetened, flavored milk. Garnished with pistachios and saffron.
health_benefits: Cheese provides protein and calcium. Milk offers nutrients. Saffron has antioxidant properties. Pistachios contain healthy fats.

name: Kulfi Falooda
description: Royal dessert drink with layers of rose-flavored milk, vermicelli, basil seeds, and kulfi (Indian ice cream). Garnished with nuts.
health_benefits: Milk provides calcium. Basil seeds offer fiber. Nuts contain healthy fats. Rose has cooling properties.

name: Thandai
description: Traditional cooling drink made with milk, nuts, and spices like cardamom, fennel, and saffron. Popular during Holi festival.
health_benefits: Nuts provide protein and healthy fats. Saffron has antioxidant properties. Cardamom aids digestion. Cooling for summer.

name: Aam Panna
description: Summer drink made from raw mangoes, mint, and spices. Known for its cooling properties and tangy-sweet flavor.
health_benefits: Raw mangoes are rich in vitamin C. Mint aids digestion. Prevents heat stroke. Low in calories.

name: Nimbu Pani
description: Classic Indian lemonade made with fresh lemon juice, water, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Often flavored with mint or cumin.
health_benefits: Rich in vitamin C. Aids digestion. Hydrating. The salt helps maintain electrolyte balance.

name: Makai Ki Roti
description: North Indian flatbread made from cornmeal, typically served with sarson ka saag (mustard greens curry).
health_benefits: Cornmeal provides complex carbohydrates. Gluten-free. Rich in fiber. Contains essential minerals.

name: Bajra Roti
description: Nutritious flatbread made from pearl millet flour, commonly eaten in Rajasthan and Gujarat during winters.
health_benefits: Pearl millet is rich in iron and calcium. Gluten-free. High in fiber. Provides sustained energy.

name: Missal Pav
description: Maharashtrian street food consisting of spicy sprouted bean curry served with pav (bread rolls) and garnished with farsan (crispy toppings).
health_benefits: Sprouts are rich in protein and enzymes. Provides fiber. The spices aid digestion. Contains essential nutrients.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: Mumbai's iconic street food - mashed vegetable curry served with buttered pav (bread rolls). Garnished with onions and lemon.
health_benefits: Vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. The spices aid digestion. Contains antioxidants. Best enjoyed in moderation due to butter.

name: Vada Pav
description: Mumbai's answer to the burger - spicy potato fritter sandwiched in a pav (bread roll) with chutneys.
health_benefits: Potatoes provide carbohydrates. The chutneys contain antioxidants. Best enjoyed in moderation due to frying.

name: Dabeli
description: Gujarati snack consisting of spiced potato filling in a pav (bread roll), garnished with pomegranate and peanuts.
health_benefits: Potatoes provide carbohydrates. Pomegranate contains antioxidants. Peanuts offer protein. The spices aid digestion.

name: Khandvi
description: Gujarati savory snack made from gram flour and yogurt, rolled into thin layers and tempered with mustard seeds.
health_benefits: Gram flour provides protein. Yogurt contains probiotics. Light and easy to digest. Low in fat.

name: Patra
description: Gujarati dish made from colocasia leaves smeared with spiced gram flour paste, rolled, steamed, and sliced.
health_benefits: Colocasia leaves are rich in fiber. Gram flour provides protein. Steaming makes it healthy. Contains essential nutrients.

name: Undhiyu
description: Gujarati winter specialty made with mixed vegetables, fenugreek dumplings, and spices, cooked upside-down (undhu) in an earthen pot.
health_benefits: Mixed vegetables provide diverse nutrients. Fenugreek helps regulate blood sugar. The spices aid digestion. Rich in fiber.

name: Thengai Sadam
description: South Indian coconut rice made with freshly grated coconut, curry leaves, and mild spices. Typically served with potato curry.
health_benefits: Coconut provides healthy fats. Curry leaves aid digestion. Rice offers carbohydrates. Contains essential minerals.

name: Puliogare
description: Tamarind rice from Karnataka, made with cooked rice mixed with tamarind paste, spices, and peanuts.
health_benefits: Tamarind aids digestion. Peanuts provide protein. Rice offers carbohydrates. Contains antioxidants.

name: Bisi Bele Bath
description: Karnataka's signature one-pot rice dish made with lentils, vegetables, and a special spice blend. Served hot with ghee.
health_benefits: Lentils provide protein. Vegetables offer fiber and vitamins. The spice blend aids digestion. Complete meal in one dish.

name: Neer Dosa
description: Soft, lacy rice crepes from Karnataka, made from a thin rice batter. 'Neer' means water in Kannada, referring to the batter's consistency.
health_benefits: Rice provides carbohydrates. Gluten-free. Light and easy to digest. Low in fat.

name: Kori Rotti
description: Mangalorean chicken curry served with crisp, wafer-thin rice rotti (flatbread). A signature dish of coastal Karnataka.
health_benefits: Chicken provides protein. Rice rotti is gluten-free. Coconut offers healthy fats. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties.

name: Kadala Curry
description: Kerala-style black chickpea curry cooked in coconut gravy with aromatic spices. Typically served with puttu (steamed rice cakes).
health_benefits: Black chickpeas are rich in protein and fiber. Coconut provides healthy fats. The spices aid digestion. Contains essential minerals.

name: Avial
description: Kerala's mixed vegetable curry in coconut-yogurt sauce, seasoned with curry leaves and coconut oil. A staple in Onam sadya (feast).
health_benefits: Mixed vegetables provide diverse nutrients. Coconut offers healthy fats. Yogurt contains probiotics. Light yet nutritious.

name: Ela Sadya
description: Traditional Kerala feast served on banana leaf, featuring rice with multiple curries, pickles, and desserts. Served during festivals.
health_benefits: Balanced meal with carbohydrates, proteins, and vegetables. Coconut provides healthy fats. The variety ensures diverse nutrient intake.

name: Kappa Meen Curry
description: Kerala's comfort food - tapioca (kappa) served with spicy fish curry. A staple dish in coastal Kerala households.
health_benefits: Tapioca provides carbohydrates. Fish offers protein and omega-3. Coconut provides healthy fats. The spices aid digestion.

name: Kozhikode Biryani
description: Malabar-style biryani from Kozhikode, featuring fragrant rice, tender meat, and a distinct blend of spices. Lighter than Hyderabadi biryani.
health_benefits: Meat provides protein. Rice offers carbohydrates. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Contains essential nutrients.

name: Appam with Stew
description: Kerala breakfast of lacy rice pancakes (appam) served with mild vegetable or meat stew in coconut milk.
health_benefits: Rice provides carbohydrates. Coconut milk offers healthy fats. Vegetables or meat provide protein. Light yet nutritious.

name: Puttu Kadala
description: Classic Kerala breakfast - steamed rice cakes (puttu) served with kadala curry (black chickpea curry).
health_benefits: Rice provides carbohydrates. Chickpeas offer protein and fiber. Coconut provides healthy fats. Contains essential nutrients.

name: Kuzhi Paniyaram
description: South Indian dumplings made from fermented rice batter, cooked in a special pan with cavities. Can be sweet or savory.
health_benefits: Fermented batter aids digestion. Rice provides carbohydrates. Can be made with less oil. Contains probiotics.

name: Chettinad Chicken
description: Spicy chicken curry from Tamil Nadu's Chettinad region, known for its robust use of peppercorns, fennel, and other spices.
health_benefits: Chicken provides protein. Peppercorns may boost metabolism. The spices have anti-inflammatory properties. Contains essential nutrients.

name: Kothu Parotta
description: Tamil Nadu street food made by chopping up parotta (layered flatbread) and stir-frying it with eggs, onions, and spices. It's a popular breakfast or snack in Tamil Nadu.
health_benefits: Parotta provides carbohydrates. Eggs provide protein. Onions offer fiber. The spices aid digestion. Contains essential nutrients.

name: Idiyappam
description: Tamil Nadu's signature rice noodle dish, made by steaming a batter of rice flour, coconut milk, and spices. It's a popular breakfast or snack in Tamil Nadu.
health_benefits: Rice flour provides carbohydrates. Coconut milk offers healthy fats. The spices aid digestion. Contains essential nutrients.

name: Ramen
description: A Japanese noodle soup dish with Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and topped with sliced pork, nori, menma, and scallions.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from pork/chicken broth. The noodles provide carbohydrates. Contains vitamins from scallions and nori. The broth aids hydration.

name: Beef Wellington
description: A British dish made of fillet steak coated with pâté and duxelles, wrapped in puff pastry and baked. Often served with red wine sauce.
health_benefits: High in protein and iron from beef. The mushrooms provide B vitamins. Contains healthy fats.

name: Ratatouille
description: A French Provençal stewed vegetable dish originating from Nice, featuring eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, tomatoes, and herbs like herbes de Provence.
health_benefits: Rich in fiber and vitamins from vegetables. Low in calories. The olive oil provides healthy fats. Antioxidant-rich from tomatoes and herbs.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian dish featuring grilled chicken chunks in a spiced creamy orange-colored sauce. The dish has roots in both Indian and British cuisine.
health_benefits: High in protein from chicken. The yogurt provides probiotics. Turmeric has anti-inflammatory benefits. The tomatoes offer vitamin C.

name: Goulash
description: A Hungarian soup or stew of meat and vegetables seasoned with paprika and other spices. Traditionally made with beef, onions, carrots, and potatoes.
health_benefits: Rich in protein from beef. The paprika contains antioxidants. The vegetables provide fiber and vitamins. Warming spices aid circulation.

name: Baklava
description: A rich, sweet dessert pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey. A classic dessert in Middle Eastern and Mediterranean cuisines.
health_benefits: Nuts provide healthy fats and protein. The honey offers antioxidants. Best enjoyed in moderation due to sugar content.
